MICRO & MACRO HYALURONIC ACID: 2 anti-age must-haves, known to effectively fill wrinkles, smooth skin & intensely hydrate. Formulated with the highest concentration of Hyaluronic Acid in a NIVEA eye care. -Wrinkles and fine lines around the eyes are filled. -Firmness is improved. -Cell renewal is improved and skinâ€™s own regeneration speed accelerated. -Sensitive skin around eyes is replenished with intense moisture. -Skin looks immediately refreshed.
